name: Embolist Leg Growths
description: Calcified flesh creates forms of grotesque beauty.

languages.description: Verkalktes Fleisch erschafft Formen von grotesker Schönheit.

languages.description: La chair calcifiée crée des formes d'une beauté grotesque.

languages.description: Carne calcificata che crea forme di grottesca bellezza.
languages.name: Gambali Escrescenze Embolist

languages.description: 석회화된 살덩이가 만들어낸 기괴하고도 아름다운 형상입니다.
languages.name: 엠볼리스트 레그 그로스

languages.description: La carne calcificada crea formas de belleza grotesca.
languages.name: Tumores de pierna Embolist

languages.description: 钙化的肉体创造出了怪异的美感。
languages.name: 安柏勒斯腿部生长物

languages.description: Затвердевшая плоть образует форму необычной красоты.
languages.name: Наголенники: Эмболист

languages.description: 石灰化した肉塊がグロテスクな美を醸し出している。

languages.description: Zwapnione ciało tworzy formy groteskowej urody.
languages.name: Nagolenniki: Embolist

languages.description: Carne calcificada cria formas de uma beleza grotesca.
languages.name: Pernas: Tumefação Embolista

languages.description: เนื้อที่มีหินปูนเกาะทำให้เกิดรูปร่างที่งดงามแปลก ๆ
languages.name: เนื้องอกที่ขา Embolist

languages.description: Kireçlenmiş et garip güzellik formları oluşturur.
languages.name: Embolist Bacak Oluşumları
